name: Let-handedFacts
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: left handed facts
des: You can prompt Alexa, and it will give you a random left-handed fact. Say "Alexa, open Left-Handed Facts," and Alexa will recite a quick factoid about left hands or left-handedness.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
